§<html dir="ltr"><head></head><body contenteditable="true"><h3><font face="Segoe UI" size="4">The Application Settings Window:&nbsp;</font></h3><p></p><p><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">To open the <b>Application Settings</b>, click on&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';"><i>S</i></span><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';"><i>ettings&nbsp;</i><b>(1)</b><i>-&gt;Application Settings&nbsp;</i><b>(2)</b></span><span style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';"> in the top menu bar</span></p><p><font face="Segoe UI"><br></font></p><p></p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</body></html>&nbsp;&nbsp;
]ANNOFINAL§
